snippet: The workers said they were mainly protesting what they said was management’s frequent retaliation against employees who spoke up about working conditions.
abstract: Several dozen Walmart workers stage a one-day strike in Southern California, culminating in rally in Pico Rivera; workers say they are mainly protesting what they say is management’s frequent retaliation against employees who speak up about working conditions.
lead_paragraph: The workers said they were mainly protesting what they said was management’s frequent retaliation against employees who spoke up about working conditions.

headline.main: Walmart Workers Stage a Walkout in California
headline.print_headline: Walmart Workers Stage A Walkout in California

keywords.value: United Food and Commercial Workers Union
keywords.name: organizations
